name: Your own Salesforce Happy Soup
description: The best way to visualize your Salesforce dependencies

OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client Id of YOUR OWN Connected App. This can be in any org, not necessarily the orgs you will use the app with

OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of YOUR OWN Connected App. This can be in any org, not necessarily the orgs you will use the app with

SFDC_API_VERSION.description: The version of the Salesforce API

REDIS_HOST.description: The name of the host were redis is running. localhost should be used for local development. If using in heroku, use the host of your own heroku redis account

REDIS_PORT.description: The network port were redis is running. 6379 should be used for local development. If using in heroku, use the port of your own heroku redis account

SESSION_SECRET.description: A random word that you must specify. This will be used to encrypt the session cookies

PORT.description: The port where the app is running

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
